D

data - Variable in class Database.DatabaseNavigator
 
database - Variable in class Database.DatabaseConnection
 
Database - package Database
 
Database.Helpers - package Database.Helpers
 
DatabaseConnection - Class in Database
The initial connections for the database checking whether the schema has been setup and the tables exist A root user will be created on startup for the control panel
DatabaseConnection(String) - Constructor for class Database.DatabaseConnection
Constructor to setup grab the properties and setup the connection
DatabaseEncryption - Class in Database.Helpers
The class which will be used for encrypting the password data so it is secure in the database Client Side Methods: String salt = DatabaseEncryption.getSalt(30), DatabaseEncryption.generateSecurePassword(password, salt) Server Side Methods: generateSecurePassword(password, salt), verifyUserPassword(providedpassword, password, salt)
DatabaseEncryption() - Constructor for class Database.Helpers.DatabaseEncryption
 
DatabaseEncryptionTest - Class in Database
The following tests are for DatabaseEncryption methods which are used for hashing of the password for the client side and evaluation of login requests for the server
DatabaseEncryptionTest() - Constructor for class Database.DatabaseEncryptionTest
 
DatabaseNavigator - Class in Database
A class that is used by all programs to send the correct response and to receive the response turning it into a string To send data across to the server you must have, in this order: response integer, authentication details (can be empty), and data for the sql query
DatabaseNavigator(Object[], DatabaseToken, Connection) - Constructor for class Database.DatabaseNavigator
The constructor for database statements NOTE: This is only used by the server
DatabaseNavigator.Response - Enum in Database
The list of integers for responses to queries from the control panel or viewer NOTE: This is only used by the viewer and the control panel EXAMPLE OF HOW TO USE: "DatabaseStatements.Response.STORE_BILLBOARD_SCHEDULE.getValue();"
DatabaseServer - Class in Database
The Main Server class that constantly loops through awaiting connections from billboard viewers and control panel Server expects several different kinds of information to be passed to it all inside of an Object[] The Object Array must have these variables in it, in this order: A Key (int) which is the grabbed from Database Statements to tell it what action to perform Authentication LinkedList with your username, token, and permissions (this order) Data LinkedList of what to add to the statement in order
DatabaseServer() - Constructor for class Database.DatabaseServer
 
databaseStatements - Variable in class Database.DatabaseNavigator
 
DatabaseStatements - Class in Database.Helpers
The class that contains all the statements to be used and all the errors that can be returned from the statements
DatabaseStatements(int) - Constructor for class Database.Helpers.DatabaseStatements
The constructor used to create a list of statements to then be grabbed
DatabaseTest - Class in Database
The following tests are for the DatabaseStatements class which has different methods for client side applications and server side applications Client Side: Will use the public enum setup to send across an integer on the socket to explain what query needs to be used, and how to handle the query Server Side: This will act as the navigator for the server, grabbing the statement which corresponds to number from the enum and will return a TreeSet with all the information required for the the client
DatabaseTest() - Constructor for class Database.DatabaseTest
 
databaseToken - Variable in class Database.DatabaseNavigator
 
databaseToken - Variable in class Database.DatabaseTest
 
DatabaseToken - Class in Database.Helpers
This is the class that creates a token for authentication when the user that has logged in tries to access the database The token is stored in a HashMap ordered (Username, String[token, time])
DatabaseToken() - Constructor for class Database.Helpers.DatabaseToken
The Constructor of the token which will be used for authentication
DatabaseTokenTest - Class in Database
The following tests are for the authentication factor for the server to create a random token to be stored by the client and then sent back to the server to be checked that it is still a valid token It will require a few public methods for grabbing the token and remove the values when the token is no longer valid (Such as exiting the client or the 24hr time limit has been reached) The Data will be stored in a HashMap that will be shown as TreeMap
DatabaseTokenTest() - Constructor for class Database.DatabaseTokenTest
 
dateTime - Static variable in class ControlPanel.AddToSchedule
 
days - Static variable in class ControlPanel.AddToSchedule
 
DELETE_BILLBOARD - Database.DatabaseNavigator.Response
Params: billboard name Returns: nothing
DELETE_BILLBOARD - Variable in class Database.Helpers.DatabaseStatements

Params: billboard name Returns: nothing

Params: billboard name, starting time Returns: nothing

Params: username Returns: nothing
